'''The Burning Eye''' is a [[MUDs|MUD]]. It opened in [[1997]] and is set in [[Middle-earth]] at the [[Third Age]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/burning.html The Burning Eye] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 11 April 2011)</ref><ref name="official">[http://www.burning-eye.net/main The Burning Eye], Main (retrieved 11 April 2011)</ref> The mud has more than 300 skills, 12 races and 10 classes.<ref name="official"/>

==Races==

The Burning Eye has twelve races, of which there are eight good and four evil.<ref>[http://www.burning-eye.net/world/races/ The Burning Eye], World, Races (retrieved 11 April 2011)</ref>

* [[Avari|Avari Elf]]
* [[Beornings|Beorning]]
* [[Dúnedain]]
* [[Dwarves|Dwarf]]
* [[Half Orcs|Half Orc]]
* [[Half-trolls|Half Troll]]
* [[Hobbits|Hobbit]]
* [[Men|Human]]
* [[Noldor|Noldor Elf]]
* [[Olog-hai|Olog-Hai]]
* [[Teleri|Teleri Elf]]
* [[Uruk-hai|Uruk-Hai]]

==Classes==

This mud has ten classes.<ref>[http://www.burning-eye.net/world/classes/ The Burning Eye], World, Classes (retrieved 11 April 2011)</ref>

* Archmage
* Bashkar
* Cleric
* Monk
* Paladin
* Ranger
* Sorcerer
* Thief
* Warrior
